content: Hi Dr. Wilson, I've been tracking my sleep for a week now and I'm seeing some patterns. Should we discuss this in our next session?
That's great to hear! I'm pleased you're seeing patterns emerge. Let's definitely discuss this in detail during our session on Monday. In the meantime, keep up the consistent tracking.
Perfect! I also wanted to ask about the meditation app you recommended. Should I use it every night or just when I'm having trouble falling asleep?
Dr. Wilson, I had a really difficult night last night. I followed all the sleep hygiene rules but still couldn't fall asleep until 2 AM. Any suggestions?

I'm sorry to hear you had a difficult night. These setbacks are normal during the process. Let's try the 20-minute rule - if you can't fall asleep within 20 minutes, get up and do a quiet activity until you feel sleepy. We'll discuss more strategies in our upcoming session.
Thank you for the advice. I tried reading for 15 minutes when I couldn't sleep and it actually helped! I'll continue with this approach.
Hi Michael, I noticed you missed your sleep diary entry yesterday. Remember, consistency is key to tracking your progress. How are you feeling today?
